subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] New file uploaded to Read_Alphabet
msgSnippet: ... I did a bit of image editor magic in order to get hopefully get a clearer image. I just uploaded the result. ... I shall read/decipher it with great
messageBody:
Moira O'Brien skrev:
> Hello all
>
> With all the conjecture that goes on about KR's thoughts
> about this or that, I thought it might be useful to upload
> a letter in KR's own QS hand, written to the letter
> writing circle in December 1969.
>
> I am sorry that it is scanned from a rather poor photocopy
> (laser copies weren't around in those days) so some of it
> may be a bit difficult to read.

I did a bit of image editor magic in order to get hopefully
get a clearer image. I just uploaded the result.

> However, some of the letter may be pertinent to the
> discussions on dialect and pronunciation as well as giving
> an insight into KR's use of QS.

I shall read/decipher it with great interest!


/BP 8^)>
--
Benct Philip Jonsson -- melroch atte melroch dotte se
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
No man forgets his original trade: the rights of
nations and of kings sink into questions of grammar,
if grammarians discuss them.
-Dr. Samuel Johnson (1707 - 1784)
